itunes:title: 1 & 2 Timothy Week 2 with Kelsey Hency
title: 1 & 2 Timothy Week 2 with Kelsey Hency
description:
Join us for week 2 of our 1 & 2 Timothy reading plan as Raechel and Amanda discuss the Scripture with guest Kelsey Hency, author and editor. As they finish up the final chapters of 1 Timothy, the three discuss the beauty and responsibility of life in the family of God as we learn from Paul’s encouragement and challenges to Timothy. Listen in with us as we ask good questions of God’s Word together and discuss both its original context and how we can apply it to our lives now. 


Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 2 of the She Reads Truth Title reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Title collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/1-2-timothy-week-2-with-kelsey-hency
